import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { appServices } from '../../services'; import './final_project.css'; import { Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from 'reactstrap'; import { Button, FormGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Final_Project = () => { const [modalDetail, setModalDetail] = useState(false); const [dataFinal, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { appServices().then((result) => { setData(result.data); }); }, []); const toggleDetail = () => { return setModalDetail(!modalDetail); } return (

OUR PROUD PROJECT

{dataFinal.map((data) => { return ( ) })}
Title Author Year
{data.title} {data.author} {data.year}
Detail
Title : Data
Author : Data
NIM : Data
Lecture 1 : Data
Lecture 2 : Data
Year : Data
) } export default Final_Project;
